snippet: Sri Lanka released 572 prisoners and reduced terms for others on Wednesday in connection with Pope Francis’ visit and his proclamation of the country’s first saint.
abstract: Sri Lanka, responding to visit by Pope Francis, releases 572 prisoners and reduces sentences for others.
lead_paragraph: Sri Lanka released 572 prisoners and reduced terms for others on Wednesday in connection with Pope Francis’ visit and his proclamation of the country’s first saint.

headline.main: Sri Lanka: Prisoners Freed in Honor of Pope’s Visit
headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka: Prisoners Freed in Honor of Pope’s Visit
